Edgeville Pk'ing :)
Features: ;)
- Features - * No Lag! * 24\7 * Open staff spots! * All Godswords with Real Special * Training(0r do ::master) * Clan Chat * Duping Fixed * Trade with no Bugs * Custom Player Killing Point Shop * Perfect Pking! * Nice Staff's
* JOIN TODAY!

We are running server on a vps with:
5GHZ 5Gb Ram 100gb Harddrive
